items.title: Netanyahu does not rule out further strikes on Hamas leaders
items.description: At a joint press conference with US Secretary of State Marco Rubio, Netanyahu said every country had the right "to defend itself beyond its borders".

items.title: US says 'framework' for TikTok ownership deal agreed with China
items.description: The deal will pave the way to US ownership of the social media platform' s American operations, according to the US treasury secretary.

items.title: Men jailed for attempting to bewitch and kill Zambia's president
items.description: The pair were sentenced to two years in prison after being found with charms, including a chameleon.

items.title: Conor McGregor ends bid to be Irish president
items.description: The MMA fighter says the decision comes after "careful reflection" and consultation with his family.

items.title: China accuses Nvidia of violating anti-monopoly laws
items.description: The accusation comes as the US and China hold talks to de-escalate the trade war between the two.
